Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 80th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1981...
Injured on 5/10/1982 with a Torn Hamstring Muscle, out for full season...
Had first career hit (double) on 8/13/1983, off Tom House (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/15/1984, off Mike Flanagan (OAK)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against California on 8/3/1987...
Injured on 5/21/1988 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/5/1989 to a 3-year deal worth $2,750,000 per year...
